DOC.detailed_description: Healthy male subject administrate multiple-dose period I II ( Crossover ) dilatrend SR capsule 32mg dilatrend tablet 25mg .
DOC.criteria: Between 20 age 35aged healthy male Body Weight 50kg , within 20 % ideal body weight ( IBW ) . IBW ( kg ) = { height ( cm ) 100 } *0.9 Have congenital chronic disease medical symptom . Suitable result inspection ( laboratory test , ECG , etc ) within 21 day IP administration . Agreement write informed consent Subject hypersensitivity reaction clinically significant history carvedilol investigator drug . Clinically significant cardiovascular system , respiratory system , liver , kidney , endocrine system , gastrointestinal system , central nervous system , blood tumor , mental disease , skin disease , otorhinolaryngologic disease . Hypotension ( SBP < 105mmHg DBP < 65mmHg ) , Hypertension ( SBP > 150mmHg DBP > 100mmHg ) Heart rate < 50times/minute Active liver disease AST , ALT > 1.5*upper limit normal range Creatinine clearance < 80mL/min Subject disease affect drug 's ADME gastrointestinal surgery . Subject symptom injure acute disease within 28days first IP administration . Subject history drug abuse positive reaction drug abuse screen test urine . Taking ETC medicine include oriental medicine within 14days first IP administration Taking OTC medicine within 7days Subject take abnormal meal affect ADME drug . Previously participate trial within 90days . Previously make whole blood donation within 60days component blood donation within 30days first IP administration . Continued take caffeine ( caffeine > 5cup/day ) , drink ( alcohol > 21unit/week , 1unit = 10g = 12.5mL pure alcohol ) clinical trial drink severe heavy smoker ( cigarette > 10cigarettes/day ) . Subject positive reaction serum test ( HBsAg , HCV Ab , HIV Ag/Ab , VDRL ) Genetic problem galactose intolerance , Lapp lactase deficiency , glucosegalactose malabsorption .
